name: Custom Block Styles for Gutenberg
author: Altaf Hussain Patel

sections.description:
Custom Styles for Gutenberg Blog enhances your building capability of your website. Our plugin applies style and some borders, background, labels to your block and makes your gutenberg builder look alike modern wordpress builder.
It gives you the power to use gutenberg as your default builder for web development. Look at other builders like (elementor, visual composer) you may feel like these.
Initially we have added common 3 styles used by gutenberg listed below.

  • “Group” visual editor feel
  • Gutenberg Columns styles
  • Gutenberg Spacer styles
  • Magic Block (creates div with desired classes) styles

Donations
sections.installation:
• Upload the entire custom-styles-guten-berg-block folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu within the WordPress Dashboard.
  • If you get any activation error please ignore that we will fix that bug in next release but the plugin works perfectly.

You will now see the Gutenberg Block Custom Styles working in your WordPress pages and posts.
sections.faq:
Q. I am unable to see the styles for my block?
A. If you have downloaded a plugin and unable to see the style of that particular plugin blocks. Try enabling and disabling the plugin. or please write to us we will design it.

Q. I want to write my own style for a particular block.
A. Kindly ask that question in support. We will add that style in our plugin.

Q. I get an error after activiation?
A. If you get error after activiating the plugin you may consider ignoring it but your plugin will work perfectly.

screenshots.caption: Group enhancement with better borders and visiblity.
Gutenberg Columns which have light background and column divider which enhance the columns visiblity.
You can see the Gutenberg Spacer which is in color and have visible text describe the block.
Magic block with spacer and column.
